products.title: Santiago Cotton Sunshine Yellow Roman Blind
products.description: Their santiago cotton roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. This sunshine yellow cottonroman blind, introduces a on-trend bright yellow shade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a free five year warranty, for extra peace of mind.
